name: Sylvie’s Crêpes
description: Thin, tender pancakes perfect served as an appetizer, entrée or dessert. Layer, stack, fold or roll with a variety of sweet or savoury fillings.
preparation: Whisk eggs, water and milk in a mixing bowl. Whisk in the flour and melted butter until smooth. Let batter rest for one hour or make ahead and refrigerate overnight. You can also make the batter in a blender.
Preheat a frying pan over medium high heat. Add a 1⁄4-cup of batter to the pan and quickly tilt and swirl to form an even coating on the bottom of the pan.
Cook for 1 minute until set and turning golden brown underneath. Gently flip the crêpe over and cook for 1 more minute. Repeat. Stack, cover and keep warm while using up the remaining batter.
